sentences.sContent: Creativity and uniqueness often depends on how well you hide your sources.
sentences.sContent_eng: Creativity and uniqueness often depends on how well you hide your sources.
sentences.sCn: 创意和独特性往往取决于如何隐藏你的创意来源。

sentences.sContent: This (I hope) will be unique within the scope of the trace, and the combination of thread ID and random number should afford you uniqueness across multiple JVMs.
sentences.sContent_eng: This (I hope) will be unique within the scope of the trace, and the combination of thread ID and random number should afford you uniqueness across multiple JVMs.
sentences.sCn: 它（我希望如此）在跟踪的范围内将是唯一的，而线程 ID 和随机数的组合应该能够满足跨越多个 JVM 的唯一性。

synos.tran: 独特性；独一无二；单值性

words.tran: 独特的，稀罕的；[数] 唯一的，独一无二的
